data.title: “I Can’t Get Started” (1937)
data.meta_description: "I Can't Get Started" Music composed by Vernon Duke, lyric by Ira Gershwin. Recorded by Bunny Berigan and His Orchestra for Victor on August 7, 1937 in New York. Bunny Berigan, trumpet, directing: Steve Lipkins, first trumpet, Irving Goodman, trumpet; Thomas "Sonny" Lee, first trombone; Al George, trombone; Robert "Mike" Doty, first alto saxophone; Joe…
